article.Heading: Over 13% increase in Budget allocation for I&B Ministry
article.Summary: According to the revised estimates for 2015-16, the allocation of the I&B Ministry was Rs 3,588.58 crore while for the financial year 2016-17 it has been increased to Rs 4,083.63 crore.
article.Body:
The Information and Broadcasting Ministry saw an increase of around 13.8 percent in its annual Budgetary allocation today.

According to the revised estimates for 2015-16, the allocation of the I&B Ministry was Rs 3,588.58 crore while for the financial year 2016-17 it has been increased to Rs 4,083.63 crore.

Of these, Rs 3,108.86 crore would go to public broadcaster Prasar Bharati. Rs 52 crore has been earmarked for Doordarshan's Kisan channel.

The Budget also allocates Rs 491.78 crore on information and publicity head.
